thread.title: The Best Windows Laptop $1,000(ish) Can Buy

author: David Pierce
title: The Best Windows Laptop $1,000(ish) Can Buy
text:
You still need a laptop. You can try to work from your phone—best of luck—and technically an iPad does a lot of laptop-y things. But when there’s work to be done, nothing else beats that combination of keyboard, trackpad, larger screen and desktop apps.

Buying a laptop is a little harder than buying a phone. Companies sell so many models and so many options, it feels like you need a Ph.D. to tell them apart. How is anyone supposed to make sense of a choice like Intel Core i5-8600K vs. Intel Core i7-8550U? If you get it wrong,...
